S06n570:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimucyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nāvatiṣṭhate na dhandhāyati na vicikitsati na kāṅkṣati,
S06n570:4: bhagavānāha-yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimokṣyate nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate nāvasthāsyate na dhandhāyiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati,
S06n570:9: chandaṃ janayiṣyatyudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitum,
S06n570:12: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā gaurnotsṛjati vatsam,
S06n570:13: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tāvanna prahāsyati dharmabhāṇakaṃ yāvadasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kāyagatā vā bhaviṣyati pustakagatā vā,
S06n570:14: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyuto manuṣyeṣvevopapannaḥ ||
S06n570:15: subhūtirāha-syādbhagavan etaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ?
S06n570:16: bhagavānāha-syātsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya paripraśnīkṛtya tebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
S06n570:18: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
S06n570:20: yena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paryupāsitaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ paripṛcchitaḥ paripraśnīkṛtaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya,
S06n570:22: yena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā,
S06n570:25: tasya punarapi manuṣyeṣvevopapannasya asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
S06n570:31: tathā hi asyāṃ asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
S06n570:34: punaraparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato'pi śrutā bhavati,
S06n570:35: paryupāsitā paripṛṣṭā paripṛcchitā paripraśnīkṛtā ca bhavati,
S06n570:36: ekaṃ vā dinaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā pañca vā dināni,
S06n570:41: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati-yena pūrvaṃ na saṃparipṛṣṭā bhavatīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06n570:45: tasya kaṃcitkālaṃ chando'nuvartate asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śravaṇāya,
S06n570:51: navena yānenāgataḥ sa bodhisattvastāṃ śraddhāṃ taṃ prasādaṃ taṃ chandaṃ prahāsyati,
S06n570:52: yadutaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nānugrahīṣyati nānuvartiṣyate nānuparivārayiṣyati |
S06n570:54: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ te tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā na gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
S06n570:57: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
S06n570:62: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvaḥ śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa premamātrakeṇa chandamātrakeṇa samanvāgataḥ sa ca prajñāpāramitāṃ nādhyālambate,
S06n570:64: aprāpta eva sarvajñatāṃ śrāvakatve pratyekabuddhatve vā sthāsyatīti |
S06n570:65: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasti śraddhā,
S06n570:81: evaṃ teṣāṃ sā śraddhā sā kṣāntiḥ sā rūciḥ sa cchandaḥ tadvīryaṃ so'pramādaḥ sādhimuktiḥ so'dhyāśayaḥ sa tyāgaḥ tadgauravaṃ sā prītiḥ tatprāmodyaṃ sa prasādaḥ tatprema sā anikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum |
S06n570:82: te ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prāpya sarvajñatāyāṃ sthāsyanti |
S06n570:83: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī va puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahet,
S06n570:90: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti rūciḥ asti chandaḥ asti vīryam astyapramādaḥ,
S06n570:97: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca aparigṛhīto bhavati,
S06n570:98: veditavyametatsubhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyata iti |
S06n570:99: kaśca subhūte bodhisattvasyāntarā vyadhvani vyavasādaḥ- śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā?
S06n570:100: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭena nadīto vā sarasto vā taḍāgato vā udapānādvā tato'nyebhyo vā udakādhārebhya udakaṃ parivahet,
S06n570:101: tasya tadudakaṃ parivahato veditavyametatsubhūte svastinā anantarāyeṇa ayaṃ ghaṭo gṛhaṃ gamiṣyatīti |
S06n570:104: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ,
S06n570:113: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto bhavati |
S06n570:114: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyate |
S06n570:116: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvamanākoṭitāmaparikarmakṛtāṃ cirabandhanabaddhāmudake'vatārya samāropitabhāṇḍāṃ paripūrṇāṃ bhārārtāmabhirūḍhaḥ syāt,
S06n570:121: evaṃ sa sārthavāho'nupāyakuśalo dauṣprajñena mahatā arthaviyogena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
S06n570:123: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ,
S06n570:135: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
S06n570:136: veditavyametatsubhūte aprāpta evāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāratnākaramantarā saṃsatsyati,
S06n570:141: kā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya antarā vyadhvani saṃsīdanā?
S06n570:143: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātīyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvaṃ subaddhāṃ bandhayitvā svākoṭitāmākoṭayitvā suparikarmakṛtāṃ kṛtvā udake'vatārya bhāṇḍamāropya pūrṇāṃ kṛtvā samaṃ yojayitvā yuktena vātenābhipretāṃ diśamanupūrveṇa gacchet,
S06n570:147: mahālābhena cāyaṃ sārthavāhaḥ saṃyokṣyate yaduta laukikai ratnairiti |
S06n570:148: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruci chandaḥ asti vīryam,
S06n570:157: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāvirahito bhavati,
S06n570:158: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
S06n570:162: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati-yato'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06n570:176: ete cāsya dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena cāvirahitā na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pratipatsyante |
S06n570:178: tenaite dharmā abhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ tato'syā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāya bhaviṣyantīti |
S06n570:179: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
S06n570:180: tasya kaścideva śarīre vyādhirutpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā |
S06n570:181: takiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣo'parigṛhīto mañcāduttiṣṭhet ?
S06n570:185: sa tayā jarayā tena ca vyādhinā kṣapito yadyapi mañcāduttiṣṭhet,
S06n570:187: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06n570:201: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
S06n570:203: atha ca punaḥ subhūte evaṃ veditavyam-ayaṃ bodhisattvo'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
S06n570:205: yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyatīti |
S06n570:207: yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītatvādupāyakauśalyena ca virahitatvāt |
S06n570:208: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa eva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
S06n570:209: tasya śarīre kaścideva vyādhirūtpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā,
S06n570:211: tamenaṃ dvau balavantau puruṣau vāmadakṣiṇābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ svadhyālambitamadhyālambya suparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhya evaṃ vadetām-gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi yāvaccākāṅkṣasi gantum,
S06n570:216: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06n570:231: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
